About

Exams

Apprentices need to take several exams during their apprenticeship, mostly during in-class technical training.

[ Learn about the exam process](/get-certified/about-exams)

Trade

Qualifiers

If you have experience working in a skilled trade in B.C., Canada, or another country and are looking to get certified, you may be eligible to challenge your trade.

[ Learn how to challenge a trade](/challenge-skilled-trade)

![Two tradespeople in PPE on the jobsite, holding tools. ](/sites/default/files/2022-12/SKILLED%20TRADES_09072022_0052_0.jpg)

Skilled Trades

Certification

With Skilled Trades Certification now in effect in B.C., individuals working in certain trades are required to register as an apprentice or challenge their trade.

[ Learn More](/skilledtradescertification)

## 

Getting Ready to

Write Your Exam

#### [Exam Schedule We offer regularly scheduled exams throughout B.C. View Schedule](/exam-schedule) #### [What to Expect on Exam Day Materials supplied, forms of acceptable photo ID, and timing Learn More](/what-to-expect-on-exam-day) #### [Exam Rewrites How to rewrite your exam Learn More](/exam-rewrites) #### [Exam Results How to obtain your results and how exams are marked Learn more](/exam-results) #### [Exam and Study Support Study resources and videos on preparing for your exam Get Support](/get-certified-about-exams/exam-study-support) #### [Exam Accommodations SkilledTradesBC has exam support options for individuals who require specific accommodations Learn more](/exam-accommodations)

Previous slide __ Next slide __

![man working](/sites/default/files/2022-12/holder-military-certification.jpg)

Holders of a Certification of Qualification or Military Certification

Individuals who are certified in a skilled trade outside of B.C. or have a Military Trade Certification may be eligible to receive a B.C. Certification of Qualification or Red Seal Endorsement through an application process. 

[ Learn more](/canadian-and-military-certificate-holders)

![woman hairdresser](/sites/default/files/2022-12/labour-mobility.jpg)

Labour Mobility

If you hold a Certificate of Qualification from a trade board in Canada, SkilledTradesBC will recognize it.

[ Learn More](/labour-mobility)

![](/sites/default/files/2022-12/SKILLED%20TRADES_09072022_0017.jpg)

Skill Development through TradeUpBC

TradeUpBC is a provincially-funded initiative that provides experienced tradespeople and employers access to microcredentials and short-term skill development offerings, helping them stay resilient and become future ready.

[ Learn more](https://www.tradeupbc.ca/)
